description: I really liked the new recent changes. Keep it up
A clean but powerful tag editor
Very good and simple tool to fix tags of MP3 files library
Crashes when trying to add an album cover. Now also crashes every time I lauch it. Text tags work great, though.
Works very well, can also download metadata from database

After latest update from 2023-07-02, app force close after pressing apply button. It is great app, did not want to change it - so, I was downgrade it to previous version with:

sudo flatpak update --commit=02e79508c23cca93891850cc31f547c1ad6b0f5e920e65f9b409cf3d4134e7bf org.nickvision.tagger
summary: After latest update, app stop working

description: Ayant toute ma musiques sur mon NAS, il me fallait absolument un editeur capable d'acceder aux dossiers dans le réseau, après en avoir essayer plusieurs, Tagger est le seul qui m'a permis de le faire, rien que pour ça il mérite ses 5 étoiles !

This app is the BEST app to edit audio file tags. 
I like especially downloading the metadata from MusicBrainz, but the power of that comes only out if we select multiple audio files. 
Then the audio data is downloaded from MusicBrainz. 

This really cool feature encouraged me to start contributing to the MusicBrainz database!

Managing music libraries on Linux used to be a pain before I found this tool. I was using three different tools - eyed3, kid3-qt, and MusicBrainz Picard. Tagger does everything I used those 3 apps for, and in a nice simple interface.
summary: A godsend for people with large music collections

description: App looks really well constructed, well thought out, and was obviously written by a very talented UI designer and musicologist but inexperienced programmer. The PROBLEM is that at this time the app cannot WRITE back properly to an SMB share. Also a more experienced programmer would have tested with 20k+ tracks and would have seen very quickly the horrible lag and would have placeholder/threaded the background processing and not attempted to render the entire universe in order to keep the application quick. I do think this application holds much promise but very unfortunately I cannot use it right now and may be forced to hack up some crude but effective throwaway code to do some mass tagging.
I love the app; it's very easy to use an works great. HOWEVER, for some reason, it uses upwards of 4GB of RAM (in some cases, up to 9GB of RAM) on my system when in use. That is absolutely crazy.
Frequently when I used extended search the application crashes when I type the trailing quote or when an extended search is already typed and then I change the value to search for.
Interfaz minima, sin lios, sencilla y clara. Muy facil de usar.
Muy intuitiva y bonita, sí pero al momento de aplicar las nuevas etiquetas que has colocado te deja el archivo tal cual estaba anteriormente. No cumple con su función.

Es una excelente aplicación, sobre todo porque si tienes un archivo sin metadatos tiene la función de descargarla y puede escribir esa información como nombre de archivo, y lo mejor es que la edición se hace en dos pasos evitando que por error arruines tu archivo. Gracias al dev.
summary: Muy pero muy buena, me ha gustado mucho

description: Nice application but unable to write to external USB drive (read only). Writing is ok on home sub directories.
Всю музыку храню локально на ПК. Эта программа позволяет редактировать метаданные музыки и она это делает.
Просто и понятно. Ничего лишнего. Автор молодец!
Отличная программа
Отлично, быстро и надежно!
